name: VoiceStamps
tagline: Full Service IVR Hosting and Design.
description:
Voice Stamps is a professional IVR Hosting and Design Service Provider. We have been building IVR Apps since the late 90's when IVR was just getting started.
Voice Stamps offers state of the art in Voice Verification Services, Messaging Services, and Payment Processing by Phone.  We have combined Telephony and Internet Resources to Create a Unique Set of Business Applications for Protecting and Promoting Your Business.  
Through various partnerships with the leaders in Voice Messaging and Payment Processing, we are able to provide your with both automated voice related services and automated payment processing services integrated together.  
Many of our Custom IVR Apps may be the first in existence.  We will work with your business to offer a custom solution to fits your needs.  
We can offer a complete turnkey system for your financial transactions including check processing, credit card processing, phone bill processing, with a third party verification and a time and date stamp for added protection.
READ MORE...
